name: Three Goblin Wobblin'
description: Goblins are prohibited from entering a local tavern, but luckily, they hatched a cunning plan. Move and balance the three goblins to help them quench their thirst and end goblin discrimination in this cute casual wobbling simulator.

name: Leap to the Top+
description: You are a frog, leaping automatically every second to the top. But can you beat all 7 of the grueling levels along with defeating powerful foes to learn how to Leap to the Top? Can you get the best times for true mastery along with collecting all of the hidden collectables in each stage?

name: P.R.O.T.O.C.O.O.L.: Silver Pack
description: P.R.O.T.O.C.O.O.L. It is a multiplayer TPS game with fantastic and colorful graphics, developed by a small team. Fight across multiple game modes and ever-growing maps. Take to the Field, Fight and Survive!

name: Cuckies & Cream: Maids for Milking
description: Madam, if you have no money won't you sell your body? That's where you and your huge... "wallet" come in! At first they're doing it to pay off their husband's debts, but once these four married maids are hooked on your donations they'll be calling you Master in no time~

name: Cum & Climb
description: The higher you climb, the more undressed your companion will be! Choose one of the two and start to Cum and Climb! The most realistic animations and 3D models are waiting for you!

name: Nascar Arcade Rush: Project-X Pack
description: Nascar Arcade Rush Project-X Pack is the ultimate digital bonus content pack for the Nascar Arcade Rush game including the Project-X Hovercraft, car customizations, drivers suit and helmet, and more!

name: Infernae
description: Fear is not a shield. Only those who face it will survive this adrenaline-pumping bullet hell boss rush.

name: Wizardry: Proving Grounds of the Mad Overlord
description:
Wizardry: Proving Grounds of the Mad Overlord is a full 3D remake of the first game in the legendary Wizardry series of RPGs. It is built directly on top of the original 1981 game's code. Although it looks all new, underneath the hood is the authentic game. You can even view the original Apple II interface as you play.

While the well-known difficulty of the enemies has not been altered, quality-of-life improvements have been added in every area. Party management, navigation, spellcasting, and combat have all been significantly enhanced.

name: Quantum Tripper: Math
description:
Purchasing this DLC enables the Math map to be fully playable.
When computational advancements render human sapience obsolete.

name: Your Train 2
description: You can operate trains more and more with your own train schedule! Train routes all over Japan and Taiwan, with a total of more than 50 routes!

name: All one click
description: Prove yourself against thousands of enemies in seemingly endless waves. Upgrade your skills from fighting with an ordinary bow up to casting powerful magic spells. "All one click" is an Action-RPG that reduces player input to the most existing part of every RPG: the level-up.

name: Hard Days
description: The confinement has started, Loren (or whatever name you decide), a happily married and dangerously horny woman, is going through a difficult time in her sex life, and being locked up all day at home increases her sexual appetite.

name: Bozalleth's Curse
description: Nightmares that wake you up in cold sweat. The world of dreams hides secrets and your sins. The game 'Bozalleth's Curse' tells you the story of Mary, who had an unfortunate accident eight years ago.

name: Don't Go
description: An imagination fueled adventure. With a boy lost in a familiar world. Help him and his friend Orbie traverse a small but large world. While defending against any unfriendly creatures they might come across! Run, jump and shoot your way through the unknown. To find the truth for them both.

name: Fusing Noracam
description: Climb the mysterious tower to get the legendary treasure said to be at the top. The controls are simple, but if you make even one mistake, you will fall. You can also connect to the internet and climb with someone.

name: Pantheon: Card Game of Hentai - Part 1
description: Throw yourself into a fascinating adventure on the beach where you will meet mysterious goddesses! Defeat your opponents to win their favor and discover the secrets of their magical world.

name: Bombabomb!
description: Bombabomb! is a by old pre-installed games inspired game, where you light the bombs with matching neighbors to detonate them. The game is only complete when all the bombs have been detonated! When you say you can remove all the bombs easily, walk the talk!

name: The Windows Are Gone
description: Haunted by grief and guilt after a tragic accident, you start seeing a house in your dreams. No matter what you do, you can't get its image out of your mind. You feel it calling for you, so you answer it.

name: House 2
description:
As a terrible storm approaches, two young girls spend a fateful night watching TV and playing games…

House 2 is the sequel to the hit indie horror game, House. In House 2, you play as Tabby & Melody, finally free from their cursed home, in the next chapter of the House saga.

name: Wildlands Resurgence
description: section for a game where players need to survive from both other players and wildlife, mine resources, craft items and structures, and even form tribes:

name: Noah's Descent into Madness
description: Noah's Descent into Madness is a short horror-themed adventure and puzzle game. Make your way through a dark forest of unknown horrors while trying your best to escape the nightmare you've found yourself in.

name: Alice in the Nightmare Land
description: This is an escape adventure game. Within a building full of traps and mechanisms, your goal is to find the exit. Players will play as Alice, navigating through sealed rooms using click-based interactions to find items and solve the mechanisms to advance to the next stage.

name: Cyber Tower
description: Cyber Tower is a 3D cyberpunk Tower Defense game. Defend the city against virus-infected autonomous vehicles across 40 missions. Strategically place towers to eliminate enemies efficiently.

name: BloodSworn
description: Bloodsworn is a fast-paced, FPS roguelite game set in a blood-soaked, dark dimension. As a fugitive member of a cruel and twisted cult, you must take revenge on them alone or with the help of your friends. Whether you choose blood magic, guns or melee weapons, your path will be lined with blood.

name: Blitz Guard
description: Embark on an indie souls-like game! Master the unique Parry Gauge system, where successful parries fill the meter, but beware: a failed parry or taking damage will deplete it. Show your skill and strategy to unleash powerful abilities in epic battles!

name: Tatari: The Arrival
description: Take the role of a detective from Tokyo who tries to solve the mysterious case of the disappearance of a young camper. You will try to follow the trail of evidence to guide you through an enigmatic and paranormal case connected with a Japanese urban legend. Can you help until the end?

You have recently died in an accident, and you just want to go to paradise. But when you're sent to the depths of Hell, you can only do one thing: travel through the Nine Circles and state your case of innocence to Satan.

Everyone has been kind to you so far. Too kind, maybe. Especially the Keeper of Heresy, the Sixth Circle. In the confines of his space while an ash storm rages outside, the two of you pry each other open. But he might break you first.

name: Kenophobia
description: A Psychological Horror Backrooms Found Footage Game

name: Widow in the Endless Labyrinth
description: The story begins with a missing superhero and Widow the supervillain is the only suspect in this case. Does she have something to do with the missing superhero or is she trying to hide something? This game is an action-roguelike game with randomly generated mazes.

name: Seek & Snipe
description: Step into the shoes of a sniper and take on challenging missions. Locate and eliminate targets using your keen perception and precision skills. Become a legend!

name: Navigavia: Kirka's Island
description: Embark on an epic journey in Navigavia: Kirka's Island, a thrilling third-person action-adventure game. Unleash your inner hero against terrifying creatures.

name: Chill Seekers
description: Slide your penguins to safety in this relaxing puzzle game.

name: Lethal Beach
description: This is an RPG game where you will follow our protagonist to fight and save lives!

name: Soul's Spectrum: Awakening
description: You wake up in a mysterious dungeon, full of dangerous traps and unlucky inhabitants. Brain cracking puzzles await you while a dark story will slowly unfold in this supernatural place!

name: White Hat
description: White Hat is a bullet hell roguelite where you upgrade the game, not yourself, to progressively increase the difficulty. Earn points on runs that you can use to add more waves or research gameplay modifiers. Upgrades make the game harder, but increase your score multiplier.

name: The Last Kingdom
description: Embark on an epic journey in our immersive Viking survival game, where untamed lands await your exploration. Roam through a sprawling open world, navigating lush forests. As you brave the elements and carve out your path, your survival instincts will be put to the test.

name: Elfboarders
description: Battle against your friends as you race down the mountain slope in this multiplayer battle-racing brawler! Play with friends online, through LAN, or try to beat the computers solo. Four player maximum.

name: Curator
description: Curator is a management game whose goal is to build and manage your own museum. Several hundred real or fictitious works as well as many objects are made available to the player to allow him to create galleries unimaginable before.

name: Rough Souls
description: A game with a new game style: Rough-Like

name: The Mine
description: Embark on a captivating 3D point-and-click adventure in the copper mines of 17th-century Sweden. With a mix of humor and puzzles ranging from accessible to challenging, "The Mine" will transport you to a unique historical setting.

name: Cozy Hike
description: Dive into the serenity of Cozy Hike and discover the secrets nature has kept hidden for generations. Start your adventure today and let the wilderness whisper its stories to you.

name: Mobius
description: Mobius is a 5v5 First-Person Melee game being developed with Unreal Engine 5. Its core pillars include a high-skill ceiling, competitive gameplay, and user-created content.

name: No Numbers
description: Put two and two together in this minimalist, hex-based puzzle game that will rekindle your love for numbers. Solve thoughtfully crafted levels that invite you to engage your mind and explore the unique gameplay at your own pace.

name: Fire Water Green
description: This is a 30-second survival shooting game. You shoot with the mouse for direction and move your ship with WASD. There are 3 attributes: fire, water and green, and 3-way deadlock.

name: Shadowstalk
description: Shadowstalk is a multiplayer stealth game where you play as a hero, or a traitor possessed by an evil spirit, you should escape from various places that are haunted by supernatural dangers using your abilities and items wisely and watch out for the traitor before they kill you.

name: Cryptid Hunter
description: Cryptid Hunter is a 1st-person single player horror game where you gather clues using a myriad equipment and traps. You need to identify the cryptid itself, determine what kind of bait to use for the trap, and which trap. Fail to provide the right trap and bait, and you end up being both.

name: HeroBot!
description: "HeroBot!" Is a 2d platformer inspired by Kirby and MegaMan. You play as HeroBot a robot that can grab and absorb your enemies and use their powers against them. You can also absorb two powers and mix them together for a stronger power. Absorb and mix powers to adapt to any situation!

name: Craft Carnage
description: Craft Carnage is where survival meets strategy, where chaos meets creativity. How will you navigate this relentless realm? Will you emerge as a lone wolf, a skilled trader, or a leader of a thriving community? The choices are yours to make, and the consequences are yours to face.

name: Sud-Oh-Ku: Furry Playtime
description: "Sud-Oh-Ku Furry Playtime" blends erotic fantasies and Sudoku puzzles, immersing players in a captivating world of super horny furries. Solve puzzles, engage in seductive conversations and experience stimulating sexual intimacy with a colourful cast of furries in this enchanting indie game.

name: With Last Breath
description: Survive the post-apocalyptic world in this intense top-down shooter. Battle zombies and soldiers, manage stats, loot gear, solve puzzles, and face challenging boss fights. Adapt, scavenge, and conquer in this relentless action-packed game.

name: The Diner at the End of the Galaxy
description: Build your diner. Grow exotic ingredients and create a menu for your intergalactic guests. Send expeditions to outer worlds in search of loot. Form alliances and rivalries with powerful factions and shape the fate of the galaxy. Welcome to the Diner at the End of the Galaxy.

name: Photophore: Chapter 1
description: An arcade game that oscillates between shooting, brick-breaking and reflection.

name: Cronie the Assassin's Mission: The Teddy Bear Payment
description: What happens when a proficient assassin enters a thieves stronghold directly? Use skills to backstab enemies from behind, or fight head-on. Will Cronie be able to successfully complete the commission?

name: Multi Turret Academy
description: Multi Turret Academy is a top-down tank shooter game where you serve as the commander of various WWII tanks to participate in tank battles.

name: Oh Satan, I Gotta Hide
description: A Prophunt game made by Students at a school Named "Asane Folkehogskole" in norway Hide around our school or look for the monster's that have become Props

name: Silver Moonlight
description: After many consecutive victories, the fierce Orc warriors began to attack the capital of the kingdom of Lusnistan. The fall of the kingdom of Lusnistan is now only a matter of time.

name: Neko: Insufficient FirePower
description: Neko Insufficient Firepower is a meat pigeon 2D tablet shooting game, a cat-themed game made in a hand-drawn comic style. Quickly defeat the enemies with the cute cat!

name: Railway Fugitive
description: Railway Escape is a railway shooting light ROGUE game. The player plays a rebel warrior who escapes the pursuit of AI life enemies, fleeing along the railway line. Players need to upgrade different abilities and defeat all enemies in front of them.

name: Forbidden Story
description: Walk around the rooms, check the cabinets in detail, collect the pieces of paper and try to escape from this mysterious house!

name: Asurajang
description: Asurajang is a new Battle Royale experience that mixes in melee combat that packs a punch and trendy anime style graphics. Pick your favorite character and engage in strategic combat to become the last team standing in Asurajang.

name: Shape Hunter
description: Shape Hunter is a 2D roguelike action game in which players defeat an infinite number of monsters.

name: Time to Strike
description: Time to Strike is busted build bullet hell roguelike. Create overpowered builds and break the game by collecting powerful weapons, modifying them with whacky mods and discovering crazy synergies!

name: Car Mechanic Simulator 2021 & Revhead
description:
Car Mechanic Simulator 2021 is new production with well settled player base. Start as a fresh owner of a car garage and work your way to service empire. Get your hands dirty in highly realistic simulation game with great attention to details. Get ready to work on 4000+ unique parts and over 72 cars. Roll up your sleeves and immerse yourself into highly realistic garage environment.
Expand your range of services by investing in new work space and equipment. Repair, fix, test, paint, tune and rebuild cars. Pay a visit to a new Auction house and buy cars in various condition. If feeling lucky you can try it out at barns. Some of them may contain hidden gems - if you can find them.

Revhead is a car racing simulation game, where you have to build your own race car.
You have a friend Charlie, who is busy with building race cars. He would need some help from you and he invites you to Australia. You start your journey somewhere in a small town in Australia, where the only way to get recognised if you are able to build the fastest and best racing car around. You have Charlie, his expertise and his garage. The rest is up to you!

name: Weedcraft Inc & Big Pharm Pharmacy Tycoon Bundle
description: Make a better world with medicine in Weedcraft Inc and Big Pharma.

name: Perfect Ninja Painter
description: Perfect Ninja Painter is a colorful arcade puzzle game that's so much fun, it's hard to stop. Paint the walls through 50 levels and try to get all stars!

name: Ouija: They are Among us
description: Five young people unleash dark secrets through a Ouija board, challenging their perception of reality and blurring the line between legends and fiction.

name: Car Parking Simulator 2024
description: Get ready to test your precision and skill behind the wheel in the most immersive parking simulator yet - Car Parking Simulator 2024! Dive into a world where every inch matters, and every corner poses a new challenge.

name: Bro Falls Deluxe
description: Bro Falls is an asymmetric massively multiplayer party game with chaotic elements, trap activations, and big Falls.

name: Magic Donut Adventure: Line Match 3 Puzzle
description: Match 3 is a popular puzzle game in which you have to be careful and connect all donuts three in a row with a line!

name: Kumakichi's Birth: Destruction God
description:
Break it!
Break it! !
Break it! ! !

name: Award Winning Indie Gems 4-in-1
description: Endling – Extinction is Forever: As the last mother fox on Earth, your cubs need all your care to survive in a merciless world on the brink of destruction. Explore what is left of nature and defend your family against all threats.

name: Best Adventure 4-in-1 Bundle
description: Endling – Extinction is Forever: As the last mother fox on Earth, your cubs need all your care to survive in a merciless world on the brink of destruction. Explore what is left of nature and defend your family against all threats.

name: Octopath Traveler II + Various Daylife Bundle
description: Octopath Traveler II + Various Daylife: two great games from Square Enix’s Team Asano in one bundle!

name: Everhood: Eternity Edition
description: Welcome to an inexpressible world filled with a deep story, humor, amusing musical battles and strange delightful encounters. This is the best console version of the adventure RPG indie hit, including 16 exclusive new musical battles composed by some of the most renowned artists in the indie scene and designed by members of the community. Expect the unexpected!

name: Sift Heads World: Act 2 - The Treacherous Return
description: With the Yakuza on their tail, Kiro, Vinnie and Shorty will fly to Tokyo Japan to confront a crime lord that is set on getting Kiro’s head. This new Sift Heads World episode has more of what you like; character selection, more custom costumes, plenty of new weapons and a new interactive city to explore.

name: Break the Loop
description: Break the Loop is a turn-based Rogue-like RPG. Compose your team and create a timeline by selecting the events you'll go through. Each decision will bring you one step closer to the ultimate threat, but will you have accumulated enough power to stop the apocalypse?

name: La Frana
description: This is a very simple antigame. I made it to represent a situation very common in real life but absolutely impossible in videogames.

name: Con 10 Sedi
description:
An entry for Ludum Dare 27.

The developer interpreted the theme "10 seconds" as "10 second places", so they made a game about ten runners who try to finish a race together to win ten silver medals.

name: In-Contro
description:
An art game about communication.
A reversed shooter.
A dreamlike adventure.

name: Assenzio
description:
A short journey in the desert.
A game about sadness, loneliness and emptiness.
A little experience.

name: O Tutt'i Cavi Lesi
description:
Full of paper and hatred.
A game will fight against a player.

name: Mega Man Permafrost
description: ...features 5 polished stages, 4 smaller secret stages, original art and assets, a completely original soundtrack, and more!

name: Sift Heads World: Act 4 - Cold Memories
description: Shorty goes all the way to Russia where her past will resurface and the guys will bring her reinforcement. This episode has the most action sequences to date and features awesome new game plays.

name: Lugh World
description: A cozy MMORPG that mixes adventure, creature capture and farming.

name: Hikkikomori Quest
description:
Hikkikomori Quest is an RPG where the player controls a reclusive individual who has not left his house for a year. When he eventually runs out of food, he seeks help at the website 4chan but they only mock him, so he decides to finally venture outside and buy food.

With the help of a sarcastic tutorial owl he has to search for a 9 eleven shop. Once inside however, he is incapable of purchasing the food and his mind transforms the shop into a dungeon where he has to fight cans of soft drinks and hot dogs. The game consists of four main dungeons with a final boss and alternate endings based on some decisions in the game.

The character's basic attack is screaming, but after gaining experience he can learn new talents. While walking around he is dragged into random battles where he can also choose to run away. The statistics are based on energy and stamina. Saving is done by writing a livejournal blog entry and he shop online at Amazon. There are also some vending machines to buy drinks that replenish stamina. Other statistics are confidence, willpower and mindpower, he can wear weapons in his left and right hand (initially a fist of dork), a hat, a shirt and other accessories.

The game is very difficult. Some of the graphics are done by Paul Robertson, famous for the animated film Pirate Baby's Cabana Battle Street Fight 2006.

name: Tawamu i-call
description: Tawamu i-call is a short game with a romantic friendship element that is mainly conversational released by kanekodou.

name: Carrion: Greatest Time of Year
description: In honor of the December holidays developers Phogia Game Studio released a special holiday update for the monster game Carrion called the Greatest Time of the Year. This update is free for players and features a brand new level for players to complete in-game. This DLC level tasks players with taking the monster through a base that has been decorated for the holidays.

name: WizardryWars
description:
The game is simple: You play as Wizards who have magical powers. Using your powers, you must kill all the other wizards and be the last wizard standing.

It is as simple as that
This was made for 2 hour challenge by the talented devs at Stux Group.

name: Dawnshard
description:
Dawnshard is a multiplayer fantasy card game for pc and mobile devices. Focused on eSport and competition.

Dawnshard is the first digital card game that integrates procedural generation in deck building, with the intention of removing the meta-game.

Playing Dawnshard feels like exploring a Jungle. In the Jungle, you have the tools you have.

You can’t just look up what the best strategies are. You'll have to adapt during each game to your opponent's strategies!

name: Beltion: Beyond Ritual
description: Beltion: Beyond Ritual is a fantasy action RPG with steampunk elements. The game is set in the diverse world of Sarmontazara and includes a large variety of weapons and types of armor for players to utilize on their quest to summon the enigmatic power of Beltion.

name: Celeste Classic
description:
An unofficial port of Celeste Classic from PICO-8 to Playdate. Celeste Classic on Playdate was made to be as faithful as possible to the original game on PICO-8. But here are a few notable changes:

The game is in black and white only. A lot of visual elements have an outline to make them more readable. But this does not impact their original hitbox.

The game is rendered at 256×240 from the original 128×128. Four pixel lines are cropped at the top and bottom of the screen. The game can be played at its original resolution by disabling the Fullscreen option available in the game’s menu.

Assist mode is available under the game’s menu. This allows players to skip a level, change the game speed to 0.5×, get infinite dashes, and enable invincibility. If assist mode is used during a run, a mention is added on each level in the lower right corner, as well as in the pause screen and the final score screen.

name: Sift Heads World: Act 5 - An Exotic Job
description: Vinnie, Shorty and Kiro go deep in the depths of the Amazonian rain forest for a lucrative excursion but local mercenaries will get in their way. Fight off the ruthless mercenaries and try to accomplish your expedition.

name: Rex
description: Rex was released on the Bandai CD in 2010 by Atari. The game is a port of a 2002 PC game made in Korea by KidnKid.com and published by Mindscape. The company went defunct in 2007 so Mindscape ported the game themselves, and Rex was going to be released on September 14th, 2009 alongside the launch of the Bandai CD. However, Mindscape games were not selling well, so Mindscape sold the rights of Rex to Atari. Atari finally published the game on November 9th, 2010. The game is a platforming game based off a Korean animated series called "White Heart Baekgu", which aired from October 6th, 2000 to January 12th, 2001.

name: Sift Heads World: Act 6 - Illicit Association
description: Vinnie and his gangs’ headquarter is blown up by criminals. Now they have to find and stop them for good. Kill them before they kill you.

name: Marito Arcade 2
description: Marito Arcade 2 is a pure arcade game based on the Marito Baracus universe.

name: Taito Legends 2
description:
The PS2 version of Taito Legends 2 has a different set of games compared to the European version.
The North American release replaced Puzzle Bobble 2 (Bust-A-Move 2: Arcade Edition) with Bust-A-Move Again.

name: Banjo-Kazooie: Magic Eggs
description: A mod that implements new eggs mechanics.

name: Chitei Senki
description: Chitei Senki is an Action game, developed by Sprite and published by Msd-Japan, which was released in Japan in 1998.

name: Slith
description: A five-map episode for Doom II with Thy Flesh Consumed-inspired visuals and Plutonia-like gameplay.

name: Pop'n Pop
description: Pop'n Pop is a puzzle video game released in arcades by Taito in February 1998. It features characters from Taito games Rainbow Islands, Kiki Kaikai, Don Doko Don, and The NewZealand Story.

name: Nightfall
description: A singleplayer map made for the GZDoom port. Mouselook is recommended, but not required.

name: Sift Heads World: The Ultimatum
description: Sift Heads World: Ultimatum is the final game in the Sift Heads World series of stickman games. You play as a trio of friends that are now wanted by both the police and an Italian Mafia, but the time for running has come to an end. It's now the time for action, but will you all survive?

name: Majukes Tower Defense
description:
You are the Supreme Mage who controls a powerful magic tower. This tower attracts many monsters and monsters who dream of destroying it.

Your task as the Supreme Mage is to protect the tower and prevent it from being destroyed.

name: Revolgear II: Second Brightness
description: A freeware horizontal shooter developed by Bikkuri Software. It is an upgraded version of Revolgear II ver. 1.00 originally released in September 2012.

name: Party Connect
description: Play sequences, connecting walls and missing vowels in this online party game show based on BBC's Only Connect

name: Rest
description: A short game about death.

name: Shougakusei ha Maseteiru.
description: Sin descripción

name: Sex Play: Naughty Doctor
description: A quick and dirty game made for your pleasure. Contains visual novel elements and a sex simulation part. You play the role of a doctor who cures his patient's sexual problems.

name: Sex Story: Cuckold Life - Episode 7
description: A steamy Visual Novel featuring realistic-looking characters set in beautiful decor. The story continues with Nikki and her husband meeting her boss for a live cuckolding experience. Will Adam enjoy being dominated by the guy who fucks his wife? Follow their Sex Story and find out!

name: Halloween World
description:
Immerse yourself in the pumpkin world and go in search of adventure to a place where there is always a spooky holiday!

But remember, even at the party, don't stray too far from the crowd. Who knows what might be waiting for you in a quiet and cozy corner...

name: Tank Hunter 2
description: This is a third-person tank shooter game, offering more than a dozen tanks, to experience the sense of armor and artillery conquest.

name: OverDrift Festival: OverPass
description: This is a pass to progress and upgrowth your gaming career which opens up access to new features, opportunities and exclusive cars, and also accelerates the earning of in-game resources.

name: Bingo
description: Dive into the captivating realm of Bingo! Venture into the pulsating Bingo Arena where every moment is charged with thrill and expectation.

name: Fast
description: Fast - Go as fast as you can while avoiding obstacles and pickup up boost to go even faster.

name: Bizarro Untergrund
description:
A game written by Optimus6128 for 3DO using his own 3D engine called Bizarro Engine.

It is an early version made for the Retro Platform Jam #6, not entirely finished and the engine is not optimized yet to handle the big sprawling caves. Early versions of it with very small rooms or caves would run a bit better, but near the end he decided to draw some more corridors and cave as he thought it was very small for a level.

You basically use your particle weapon to mine gems of four kinds. Jagurel, Saturnite, Playstone and Threedium. Oxygen is depleted so you can't be too greedy. Green lamps will light the surrounding area but don't get too near as they damage you. Pink flowers are bouncing traps, they will proper you if you get close. Finally, there is no ending yet, either you jump in a box of stars like the first level or you die and the screen turns red. It's a work in progress that he will continue and optimize later after the compo ends.

name: Furcon Frenzy
description:
The furry convention is almost over and the dealers den is almost out of merchandise!

Catch as many items from the top of the Crowne Plaza without letting any hit the ground.

Watch out though, as the mischievous Pixel-Carni speeds up between rounds!

name: Rainy Day Games
description:
Rainy Day Games is 1 - 3 player series of 3 card games for children.

The player competes in card games against their opponent Ted Bear. There are three difficulty levels: beginner, smart, and genius. The three included games are: Concentration, where the player must memorize the location of a number of animated card, Old Maid, where the players choose matching cards from each other with the goal not to be the last holding the Joker, and Go Fish, where the players attempt to pick pairs from their opponent's hand.

name: Ice Muncher
description: A Colecovision clone of Pengo

name: 10-Lignes 4en1 by retropoke
description: Developed for the 2023 Basic 10Liner Contest, this is a collection of four games: Alphabet Racer, Taquin Classic, 100 A L(Heure) and Retro Squash

name: Tails Adventure: Fire of Robollion
description: A platform developed for Game Gear starring Miles "Tails" Prower. The Tails Island has been attacked by the terrible fire robots of Robollion. Explore Tails island and defeat enemies. This hack adds a few new assets, new color palettes and new levels. All of the levels from the original game were redone, from the color palette to the level design.

name: CPCMiniPac
description:
Developed as part of the 2023 BASIC 10-Liner contest. CPCMiniPac is a game based on Pac-Man. The aim is to eat all the points without getting caught by a ghost. The game is controlled with the arrow keys.

There are 2 big dots that cannot be eaten.

However, the ghosts can pass these points. So be careful!

name: Tiny-DDug
description: A clone of Dig Dug for the Arduboy.

name: The Big Deal
description: The Big Deal is a follow-up to the 2008 title Road to Vegas. It is a card game featuring 10 different play modes including Texas Hold 'Em, Black Jack, Spit, Baccarat, Whist, Higher or Lower, Casino War, Solitaire, Pairs, Five Card Draw. Adjustable difficulty levels and multiplayer with up to eight persons.

name: Sapphire Hotel: The Little Tales of
description:
The Hotel is now open!

Explore every room interacting with all whom stays. Unveil the mystery of who stole the cat’s-eye Sapphire. In this unique story driven blue world!

name: Surfer Bunny

name: Super Price Series: Reversi
description:
Reversi (also marketed by Pressman under the trade name Othello) is a board game involving abstract strategy and played by two players on a board with 8 rows and 8 columns and a set of distinct pieces for each side. Pieces typically are disks with a light and a dark face, each side belonging to one player. The player's goal is to have a majority of their colored pieces showing at the end of the game, turning over as many of their opponent's pieces as possible.

Each of the two sides corresponds to one player; they are referred to here as light and dark after the sides of Othello pieces, but "heads" and "tails" would identify them equally well, so long as each marker has sufficiently distinctive sides.

Originally, Reversi did not have a defined starting position. Later it adopted Othello's rules, which state that the game begins with four markers placed in a square in the middle of the grid, two facing light-up, two pieces with the dark side up. The dark player makes the first move.

description: Both Aero Dancing F and i received follow-up titles, with Aero Dancing F: Todoroki Tsubasa no Hatsu Hikou (2000) and Aero Dancing i: Jikai Saku Made Matemasen (2001) being released featuring new missions, planes and environments.

name: Super Maura Bros. 3
description: This new romhack offers 8 new worlds and levels. Increase the difficulty as the game progresses.

name: Pinata Hunter
description: Pinata Hunter 1 is very addicting and an enjoyable game and very user friendly. The game gives you the ability to hita pinata with something different than what ispossiblein reality. At the beginning you are given a small stick and a paper bag. The objective is simple beat the pinata to make it drop candy from the colorful elephant figurine. The paper bag is used for collecting those candy that drops from the pinata.The game is not as easy as it sounds, Pinata Hunter 1 is quite challenging and requires a great deal of strategy to receive better score.

name: Five Nights on the Toilet: Number 2
description:
A comedy parody of the Five Nights at Freddy's indie horror series, and the sequel to Five Nights on the Toilet.

Survive five nights upon a toilet in an abandoned Freddy Fazbear's location, and investigate what events brought the story to where it is now.

Features first person sit and survive horror gameplay, with many levels, secrets, and challenges.

name: Five Nights on the Toilet
description:
A comedy parody of the Five Nights at Freddy's indie horror series.

Survive five nights upon a toilet in a Freddy Fazbear's location, and find clues as to what's really happening that week.

Features first person sit and survive horror gameplay, with many levels, secrets, and challenges.

name: The Legend of Beowulf
description:
The Legend of Beowulf is an action adventure game that has been developed primarily for younger audiences.

The plot loosely follows the famous poem telling the adventures of the titular Scandinavian warrior. The player is provided a more accessible adaptation of this work, focusing on selected events portrayed in a fairy tale style. The action of the game takes place in the 6th century AD, and the protagonist's main objective is locating and defeating the beast called Grendel. In the next phase of the game, after the official coronation of Beowulf as King of Denmark, the goal is to face the mother of the defeated monster.

While playing as Beowulf, the player explores a variety of lands and eliminates comical opponents, solves simple puzzles, and plays mini-games.

name: Earth Saves Our Love
description: Net Yaroze shooting game.

name: Jagot
description: Net Yaroze Tetris-like game.

name: Nana Tan
description: Tank game for Net Yaroze.

name: Unknown Soldier: Mokuba no Houkou
description: Unknown Soldier, like its predecessor, is a full-3D third person shooter set during World War II, with a simple mission-based structure.

name: Flame Gunner
description: Flame Gunner is a 3D arcade shooter. The game is very simple - the player (or players) must perform a specific task, usually something around destroying or killing the right amount of enemies. If a player does the job, he will go to the next arena (or on the current arena, a new task will appear). 3 heroes are in the game - Falcon, Talia (she is only female in game) and Kai.

name: Aquapolis SOS
description: MSX game not unlike Lunar Rescue.

name: Metroid: Another Legend
description: A romhack for Metroid: Zero Mission around 4 hours long

name: Metroid X
description: This is one of the earliest hacks for the original Metroid. Screens, enemy and item placement, palettes, text, and more are all changed. The primary goal was to make the game more playable - the discerning player will note the careful placement of platforms and enemies to make jumps easier. However, beating the game will not be a cinch. Items are much more difficult to get, corridors are contorted into winding mazes, and many of the energy tanks have been completely eliminated.

name: Transylmania
description: Your castle has been invaded and you must clear out all of the pesky villagers by turning them into the walking dead!

name: Angel Present
description: Angel Present takes place in a 2.5D environment with adventure elements in 2 different worlds, with 3d battles. The game mixes these more action-based elements, with static screens and text and CG movies. The story centers around the main protagonist stumbling across a fairy and soon discovering they have magical powers.

name: Battleship
description: A modern Naval warfare game.

name: Pixel Puzzles Traditional Jigsaws: Pack - Variety Pack 11
description: Pixel Puzzles, your number one place for digital jigsaws.

name: Trail Out: Steel Wheels
description: Create chaos on multi-wheeled vehicles with extra features!

name: Train Simulator Classic: Saluda Grade Scenario Pack 01
description: Experience the challenges, the history, and the splendor of Norfolk Southern railroading in the Blue Ridge Mountains - with Saluda Grade Scenario Pack 01 for Train Simulator Classic!

name: Highway
description: Sin descripción

name: Fine Artist Color Pixel Number
description:
Draw great pixel arts easily with numbers
Relax yourself with Fine Artist App!
Make some great drawings very easily, just select a model with a touch on the top middle button, and paint it very quickly. You pick up a colour at the bottom of the app, and you press on the corresponding number. Draw each number until all done and enjoy a very cool pixel art by yourself.
You share it to your friends by clicking on Share button only when you are satisfied of your work.

name: Five a Side Football 2024
description: The world’s fastest, most fun five-a-side management game is back! In Five A Side Football 2024 you can take control of comedy versions of your favourite team or cast your mind back to a time before the Premier League and take on a retro challenge. Whether you're chasing the league trophy with a team of superstars, attempting to turn a mid-table squad into champions, or saving a struggling bunch from relegation; the fate of your team and your job is in your hands!

name: Generative Quest
description: A captivating multiplayer dungeon crawler built with Unreal Engine 5. Journey through haunting procedurally-generated dungeons, unleash devastating abilities, and discover legendary items while playing with up to 7 of your friends. Become the ultimate hero in Generative Quest!

name: Gas Station Simulator: DLC Pack
description: With the Gas Station DLC Pack, restore a gas station, build an airstrip, perform dynamic renovations with a hammer, and ignite fun with a party venue, collectibles, and ice cream. Elevate your Gas Station Simulator experience!

name: Transylmania II: The Vampire Bites Back!
description:
Pesky village people are back again and hell bent on destroying Vampy inside his castle!
Sheez! Sometimes it sucks to be a Vampire!

name: Engacho! for WonderSwan
description:
Engacho! is based on a popular Japanese children game.

A little boy named Sunzuki wants to prove to his angry father that he is not a coward and can stand up against the terrible monsters of the Oops Five group. Those five guys are extremely ugly and can contaminate him with an awful disease the moment they touch him. Suzuki has to run away before they can catch up.

Enter a room with the Oops Five monsters and move in different directions, while trying to avoid collision. The catch is that each monster has its own movement style. One of them will always imitate Sunzuki and move into the same direction as he; another will, on the contrary, move into the opposite direction, etc. By planning ahead, the player must make moves correctly and make it to the exit before Oops Five gets the boy.

There are different modes in the game, such as training, in which the player faces just one monster of the player's choice and get used to its patterns; puzzle mode, which takes the player through a series of rooms with different shapes and monsters; and battle mode, in which the player is thrown into large rooms where all Oops Five members roam freely. Gameplay is turn-based.

name: Loom
description:
Explore 12 environments that represent archived segments of a primordial backend to a simulated world.

Reccomended to be played in Windowed mode.

name: Pokémon Emerald Crest
description: Vanilla Emerald's Story with lots of new features from the later gen and a few extra quests.

name: Detective Zhuge
description: "Detective Zhuge" is a detective puzzle game. Players through the "two-in-one" play, in the game's story level to promote the story, explore the level to find clues to the case, and finally in the trial level, through all the clues obtained, the suspect is finally brought to justice.

name: School Fantasy
description: School Fantasy Is a single-player role-playing game, players can follow the main story to complete the quests, collect treasures; Or explore the world and trigger adventures; Or focus on developing romantic stories with different characters; Everything is up to you.

name: Take A Leak
description: Human testing is back in fashion! Solve the puzzles laid out by Toilet Labs in this piss-filled experience. Our state of the art latrine testing facilities ensure you will feel more relief on solving a puzzle than ever before.

name: Ultimus
description: Introducing Ultimus: A Vision of First-Person Shooters, circa 1965.

name: The Protean Forest
description: The game "The Protean Forest" combines Rogue-Like card game and turn based mechanisms. Defeat demons by deploying and moving unit cards in the area and using skill cards at appropriate times. Uncovering the secret of The Protean Forest

name: The Paper Trials: Chapter 2
description: A first-person horror maze game. Hiding & Standing still is Death. Run or you are dead. Trapped in a realm of nightmarish mazes with your only hope of survival is to find all of the pages to the mysterious book and escape!

name: The Infirmity
description: The Infirmity is the third-person zombie shooter game that includes the stories of different characters living during the zombie epidemic.

name: Whisper: In the Dark
description: Embark on a vibrant 2D pixel odyssey as Whisper, an emissary of the darkness. Explore an atmospheric, nonlinear world with branching paths and hidden wonders. Engage in fast-paced combat and smooth platforming in this nostalgia-infused Metroidvania adventure.

name: World of Reinvention
description: World of Reinvention is an adventure rpg for the ages set in a wonderous fantasy world briming with places to discover, creatures to encounter, and oh ever so much to learn. Who you will be is entirely up to you but be wary, the fate of this world is in your hands (probably).

name: With Eyes Closed: Season 1
description: With Eyes Closed - Season 1 is a thriller in the adult visual novel genre. It concentrates on storytelling, realistic characters, and letting players control the development of the story. The game also features plenty of hot scenes that are interwoven into the storyline.

name: Wild Hunting
description: Immerse yourself in a virtual world of outdoor hunting in wild environments full of animals.

name: Steampunk Jigsaw Puzzles: Ancient Empires
description: Long-lost civilizations are rumoured to live on in the deepest, darkest rainforests. Many intrepid explorers have attempted expeditions into these uncharted lands, but none have yet lived to tell the tale.

name: Survivors of the Mare Vitalis
description: Survivors of the Mare Vitalis is a Rogue-Lite action game, which you can discover unique planets and it's biomes while thousands of animals and uncategorized life forms coming after to kill you!! Earn Credits while destroy them, upgrade yourself and destroy the Ecosystem of each planet!!

name: Temple of Aeryn
description: In the mystical world of Temple of Aeryn, an enchanting adventure awaits you, filled with magic and mythical creatures. Tragedy strikes when a brutal assault on your village reduces your spell book to ashes, leaving you vulnerable to the encroaching darkness.

name: PushOver
description: Push your friends (or the computer) off the platforms in this chaotic 2D platform fighting game. With multiple gamemodes and even a single player mode you can push as much as your heart desires!

name: Plant Gallery: A Short Botanic Experience
description: This is a short game about a gallery with plants. As a player you can walk through the gallery and view the frames. In order to complete the game, you will need to find keys, open chests and connect the right name tags to the right paintings. Duration of the game is aproximately 15-30 minutes.

name: Panda & Crow: A Paraglide Adventure
description: Panda & Crow is a fun Third-Person Arcade Game where you play a paragliding panda. Use thermals to stay in the air, stear clear of rainy clouds, and hurry from site to site and take a selfie before your tour bus leaves!

name: Murder By Death
description: A narrative adventure set in 1930s England. Immerse yourself in an adventure where knowing who, how and why will depend on your skills as a detective.

name: Mikene's Aspects
description: Guide Mikene in the search for the 7 Aspects of Balance to achieve Omnipotence and put an end to the problem plaguing the city of Farzin once and for all. Dive into hordes of enemies in this frantic hack n' slash in the best Soulslike style!

name: Cardfight!!: Rare Card Set 14 [D-BT09] - Dragontree Invasion
description: One of set of each SP version card.

name: Samhain
description: Samhain is an investigative horror game that can be played solo or with up to four players online. Investigate brutal murder scenes and determine what creature was responsible. Next, gather tools and items to help you survive. At midnight, the monster returns.

name: Solar Pall
description: It seems that nothing has changed in the quiet village of Vitalik's grandmother. It's time to have some fun and make new friends! But what if strange things await here at every step? Get ready to go on an adventure full of secrets and mysteries!

name: Russian Warship
description: This game is a comic relief in the otherwise tragic war in Ukraine. Based on many popular jokes, it mixes shoot 'em up and tower defense genres to create an action-filled top-down shooting experience which requires tactical thinking and smart resource management

name: Rulegement
description: Can you run a big business from scratch? What if you sink, can you come out again? Own a big business and turn every part of the city into money.

name: Rolling Toolman 2 Deathly Traps
description: New rolling toolman game. Try to reach finish fast and avoid deathly traps

name: Return or No Return
description: "Return or No Return" is a first-person horror survival game set in a mansion that traps travelers passing through the infamous shortcut- The Tenebris Tunnel. After a mysterious smoke sweeps through the car, your friends have disappeared, and you're trapped! You must save them to escape death.

name: Reapers
description: A card battle game set in a dystopian universe, focused on deck building, resource management and trading.

name: Rawisland
description: You have to go to a desert island and find hidden treasures. Crafting items and unique upgrades scattered throughout the island will help you survive.

name: Lighthouse
description: Light is your only weapon in this dark and hostile world. It will help you find your way, solve puzzles and protect you from monsters. Grab your torch and venture into this horrific universe!

name: Little Scavenger
description: Fight, explore, die in a kingdom of corrupted robot. Grow stronger by finding armor, using trinkets and rescuing npcs to increase your fighting chance. Find out the secrets of the world , the reasons for the spread of the corruption and why you are immune.

name: Master of Vtuber
description: There are many reasons why someone would want to become a Vtuber, but regardless of the initial motivations for embarking on this journey, there is only one ultimate goal – to become a Vtuber Master who is loved and welcomed by the audience, capable of standing out on their own!

name: Liwertown: Rebirth
description: It's the middle of the night and a zombie pandemic just broke in this dark 2D platformer world. Explore the town, Fight zombies, Find the last survivors, and Discover who is behind the mysterious factory explosion that caused it all, all while following the story from 2 different points of view.

name: Sudoku Pro+
description: Play up to over six sextillion unique puzzles, never play the same puzzle twice!

name: Kaizo Block
description: A tough, 2D, pixel-art platformer. Overcome 8 progressively more difficult Kaizo-style levels, or try and see how fast you can finish an already completed level. On this journey, momentum, jumps, air dashes, and frequent checkpoints are your friend. The world is your enemy.

name: Ioo
description: A minimalist pixel-art single-player game focused on the exploration of a procedurally generated world. Try to finish the goal of surviving 100 days in this unknown world while you gather rare resources from any of its 30 biomes.

name: Illuminate Frame
description: "Illuminate Frame" is a mouse-click-only simple puzzle game where you strategically place various tiles on the board to conduct electricity from power tiles to terminal tiles, aiming for high scores.

name: HordeFighter 2D
description: Challenge yourself to see how long you can last against endless waves of enemies, and discover hidden areas by completing tasks. Use the souls of your slayed enemies to unlock permanent upgrades to help you survive longer each run.

name: Hi On Rhythm
description: A rhythm game? A bullet-hell? Is there a way to have it all? Then let us get Hi on the Rhythm!!

name: Hidden City Top-Down 3D
description: Find the objects that are hidden on the map.

name: Heavenstrafer
description: Heavenstrafer is a fast paced movement shooter with a gun combo system that rewards aggressiveness and experimentation. Explore the ruins of hell and destroy angels (and demons) across three chapters filled with small but challenging arenas.

name: Gods Wars: Infinity Epic
description: Come and defeat the evil gods! Create your personal outfit, overcome the siege of numerous monsters and leaders, and usher in a new victory! Gods Wars is a pixel ARPG Rogue like Game. You can obtain epic artifacts, upgrade epic skills, choose your epic pet, face the powerful evil gods!

name: Glitched Lightning
description: A top-down 2D science fiction RPG battler with crafting and resource gathering.

name: FrogLake
description: An RPG about a frog that has to save his lake from drying up. Explore the lake. Go where no frog has gone. Acquire magic water powers.

name: Friends Play Pool
description: Invite your friends to play pool. Optimised for Steam Deck

name: Coneru: Dimension Girl
description: Embark on a 2D action date with the dimension-girl, Coneru! This time, your date plan is to fend off the mysterious alien group "Hateful Fruit Company" invading Shinjuku City!

name: Cyber Avenger
description: Cyber Avenger is a top-down action game where you take on the role of a highly skilled covert operative on a dangerous mission to stop a group of terrorists. You must navigate through five maps, facing a variety of enemies, including shotgunners, snipers, melee fighters, kamikazes, and more.

name: Cyber Rail
description: Jump, grapple, slide and swing your way through a flying convoy, fending off bandit gangs with a deadly arsenal of unique weapons and upgrades. Challenging, fast-paced parkour mechanics and unique gunplay deliver a roguelike experience unlike any other.

name: Flightmare
description: Indie horror game that will take your adrenaline to another level.

name: Double Trouble
description: Double Trouble is a dating simulator where every choice you make matters! You will have to become Scott, the manager of a small branch of a large company in a small town. Can you handle the hurricane of emotions, office intrigue and maybe even find love?

name: Flow: Last Origins
description: Rip and combo through monsters to help Kioyu clear the Hunter’s Trials and uncover the source of his home settlement’s problems.

name: Eseala
description: As Eseala, you navigate misty cliffs and forgotten pockets of time, uncovering knowledge of the past, present and future.

name: Emzombed
description: Emzombed - You must kill all of the Zombies and solve the mystery of the island.

name: Dreaming with You
description: Dreaming with You is an immersive third-person adventure set within the shared dream of Michael and Sarah. In this enigmatic dream, they find themselves kidnapped, forced to collaborate for their escape. The twist: as they work together, they might fall in love with eachother in a rom-com fashion.

name: Disco Samurai
description: Disco Samurai is a unique rhythm combat game in a cyberpunk setting. Challenge your skills by smoothly combining attacks, parries, dashes and other abilities to the beat of the electronic music. Crank up the volume and seize the rhythm of the electrifying soundscape of synthwave and rock!

name: Deep Space Directive
description: Build. Expand. Upgrade. Defend. Combine TD and RTS mechanics to defend your growing economy.

name: BattleSide
description: BattleSide is a 5,000 player MMOFPS persistent Land, Sea, Air, and Space war game where you and your buddies defend and capture control points to gather resources for your faction in battles of endless fun.

name: Auxin
description: Swing your liana, plant and throw seeds in Auxin! Local and online multiplayer fun featuring intenses versus matches in 4 modes, for up to 4 players. Swing into action!

name: Ambusher
description: Ambusher is a tower defense game. Set your traps. Build your towers. Prepare your defense and survive until sunrise.

name: AloneGuy
description: AloneGuy is a 2D game in which you have to control the character on a small island, you can jump in four directions and if you make all your efforts, you can adjust to the rhythm of the game and jump over the pesky crabs in time.

name: Adventures of Deliveryman
description: Prepare for your first day of work as a delivery man, ride your bike, make deliveries, meet new people. Enjoy a delivery-filled story driven adventure in the not-too-distant future and discover the true nature of city's existence.

name: Abraca
description: Now is the time for justice! In this Roguelite game, players will be able to learn spells, strengthen skills, use the currency obtained from battles to purchase items from mysterious merchants, kill numerous demon claws, and ultimately conquer this world!

name: Apex Heroines
description: Hack&Slash – Beat'em all! Six heroines, five types of weapons and adrenaline-pumping levels create an adrenaline rush you can't resist. Easy to learn and hard to master. 4K/120Hz & SteamDeck-ready. Everyone can enjoy the game!

name: BloodMoon
description: Survive the BloodMoon's horrors! Multiplayer horror game where teamwork is crucial. Run, hide, and escape to outwit relentless evil.

name: Bloxtacle Course
description: Bloxtacle Course is a block breaker game where you are given nearly full control over the ball itself.

name: Cat Life Simulator
description: Cat Life Simulator is a realistic simulation game that allows you to see the world through the eyes of a cat. Explore the world, interact with the environment, and create your own cat's story. Your adventure begins in a domestic setting, but over time, you will discover many other places.

name: Cardchery
description: Earn Gold by shooting increasingly harder targets in a 2D Archer Minigame. Spend your Gold in the Shop to buy Booster Packs and try to collect over +200 cards which all improve the abilities of you archer!

name: Brain Escape
description: You are an experimental brain ball that uses speed, agility and smarts to complete your mission…..all while being chased by a horde of hungry zombies.

name: Bob the Elementalist
description: The magical power of the elements is our last hope for survival! Master the four elements in this indie puzzle platforming challenge.

name: Bob's Mansion
description: Bob's Mansion is a First-Person, Survival Horror, Adventure game where you use your skills to Run, Hide, Fight and Survive the darkness within your family home.

name: OMSI 2: Hohenkirchen
description: Welcome to the Hohenkirchen expansion for OMSI 2 - Experience the diversity of Thuringia with this add-on in an OMSI map that has been deliberately optimised for a fluid gaming experience!

name: Hole Switch
description: Eat the World!

name: Slots Casino Game
description: Fortunes Turn with Every Spin – Slots Casino Game!

name: Friday Night Funkin': Skibidi Invasion
description: Friday Night Funkin': Skibidi Invasion is a mod for Friday Night Funkin' based on the Skibidi Toilet series.

name: Climbing Mt. Stardust
description: An emotional journey of 4 friends to the top of a great mountain.

name: Disney's The Haunted Mansion
description: A cancelled port of Disney's The Haunted Mansion for the Game Boy Advance.

name: Overstorm
description: Overstorm is a cancelled side-scrolling platformer for the Game Boy Advance.

name: Space-Net: Cosmo Red
description: Space-Net: Cosmo Red is a role playing game published by Imagineer for the Game Boy Color. It was released alongside Space-Net: Cosmo Blue.

name: Space-Net: Cosmo Blue
description: Space-Net: Cosmo Blue is a role playing game published by Imagineer for the Game Boy Color. It was released alongside Space-Net: Cosmo Red.

name: Space-Net: Cosmo Neo
description: Space-Net: Cosmo Neo is a cancelled third version of Space-Net: Cosmo Red and Blue. The rom was leaked during the Nintendo gigaleaks.

name: Ludo Club
description: Sin descripción

name: Hello Kitty no Garden Panic
description: Hello Kitty no Garden Panic is a Japan exclusive puzzle game based on Hello Kitty. The game was only sold inHello Kitty branded Dreamcast bundles.

name: Hello Kitty Magical Block
description: Hello Kitty Magical Block is a Japanese exclusive puzzle game based on the Hello Kitty series.

name: Froot Loops: The Quest for Froot Loops Treasure
description: Toucan Sam and his nephews have discovered Black Beak's Log in his abandoned fortress! Within this log, they find maps and hidden secrets about where Black Beak hid all of the Froot Loops Treasure.

name: LEGO Technic Bionicle Nestlé
description:
In 2001, LEGO System A/S publishes LEGO Technic Bionicle Nestlé on Windows. This action game is now abandonware and is set in a licensed title, platform and promotional themes.

It's a side-scrolling platform game where the player can play as any of the five colored original Bionicle.

name: Magic: The Gathering 7th Edition Starter
description:
Introductory game to help new players learn how to play Magic the Gathering.
This game was developed by Coresoft Inc. and published by Wizards of the Coast.

It was included in the 2-Player Duel Sets of the 7th Edition Core Set of Magic the Gathering in 2001.

name: SAS: Zombie Assault
description: The world is being taken over by bloodthirsty zombies. Be brave, hide behind the barricades and face them.

name: Dancing Block
description: Unlicensed game for the Famicom.

name: A Vampire Romance: Paris Stories
description:
A young art student moves to Paris and falls in love with a young and enigmatic man. When her new love suddenly disappears, she must travel the city, solve a mystery, and discover her lover's secrets in this thrilling adventure!

Investigate the Seine river banks, the Pére Lachaise Cementery and more as you uncover clues and determine your destiny.

name: Happy Pairs
description: Famicom version of Happy Pairs.

name: Super Pang
description: Sin descripción

name: Worm Visitor
description: The Famicom version of Worm Visitor.

name: Nova
description:
Nova is essentially an RPG with horizontal Level Scaling, which means that any advantages players get over other players are temporary, with skill and game-knowledge being the primary determining factors in player success.

When a player logs into the game, they are presented with 5 points of interest: The Courtyard, the Kingdom, the Desert, the Forest, and the Dungeon. These locations' unique objectives and loot combined with their varying aesthetics and purposes give them each a unique personality.

There are 5 classes in Nova: Fire, Frost, Shadow, Nature, and Storm. Because of the bifurcated class structure and the unique synergies of the elements, there are essentially 10 fun and interesting classes. Each element entails 7 unique abilities that can be cast at any time with the only limitation being mana costs. This leads to 10 very different elemental combinations, all with access to unique Talents and Augments.

name: Magic Tower
description: NES version of Magic Tower.

name: AFL Live: Premiership Edition
description: Released for Microsoft Windows, PlayStation 2 and Xbox on 29 April 2004. The game is based on the 2004 AFL season with team rosters based on that year. It was developed by IR Gurus and was the final AFL game to be published by Acclaim Entertainment, before their bankruptcy on 1 September 2004.

name: Balvenie's Birthday Party
description: Balvenie's subjects are preparing a party for her birthday, you must help her getting ready for it.

name: Tomb Raider: Legend Demake - Chapter One
description:
A re-imagined Legend experience in the classic TR engine! Tomb Raider: Legend originally came out in 2006 and was developed by Crystal Dynamics. Legend Demake is a fan-remake developed by Delca using an enhanced version of the TR4 engine (called TRNG). Gameplay and environments are reimagined how they would be like if they were made by Core Design in the late 90's - often referred to as the 'classic' era.

Chapter One includes four levels: Croft Manor, Bolivia, Peru, and Japan. The follow-up, consisting of the second half of the game, is in development.

The Story focuses on Lara's search for her mother and the mythical sword Excalibur. For the demake, the plot has been reworked and simplified in some aspects.

Cutscenes are dubbed in French. English subtitles are provided.

name: Unread
description: Net Yaroze shooting game.

name: Supanda
description: Net Yaroze beat'em up.

name: Nobunaga's Ambition: Ranseiki
description: The ninth title in the Nobunaga no Yabou series, this game returned to province-taking battles, and a system of varying powers was introduced.

name: The Appointed Station
description: Net Yaroze shooting game.

name: Roller
description: Net Yaroze ball game.

name: The Baseball 2002: Battle Ball Park Sengen
description: The Baseball 2002 - Battle Ball Park Sengen is Japanese-exclusive sports game. It was announced March 11, 2002 and released on July 11, 2002. It was developed and published by Konami. Beside on the Original Xbox it was also released on Playstation 2. It features all the teams of Japan's professional league and a close tie-in with Nippon Television Network's TV broadcast presentation.

name: Andaron Saga
description: Andaron Saga is a fully-fledged romhack for Fire Emblem: The Sacred Stones.

name: World Heroes 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Penguins Luv Melons
description: The first homebrew game for Nintendo 64.

name: Soft Kitten Experience
description: Created by Sylvie & Aria, featuring music by Frédéric Chopin and 煉獄庭園 (Rengoku Teien) The difficulty is extremely high. Controls: Figure it out yourself!

name: TOCA Race Driver
description: A Europe-only rerelease of TOCA Race Driver/Pro Race Driver with Xbox Live features, including online multiplayer.

name: Super Pizza Time 64
description: Sin descripción

name: Zillernet
description: ZillerNet is an karaoke game, developed by Studio9 and published by Microsoft Game Studios, which was released in Korea in 2005.

name: Toy Story
description: A China exclusive Toy Story game that released for Famicom.

name: Xbox Live Arcade
description: Sin descripción

name: Super Sprint
description: Sin descripción

name: Zunou Taisen Live
description: Zunou Taisen Live (lit. "Brain Battle Live") was a game that was included alongside the Xbox Live Starter Kit during the Xbox Live launch in Japan. It contains four board games that can be played over Xbox Live, including Othello, Go, Mahjong, and Shogi.

name: Disney Junior Ready for Preschool: Forces in Motion
description: Work with Spidey and team to stop Rhino while you learn about different types of Force.

name: Sudoku
description: Sin descripción

name: Sudo King
description: Sin descripción

name: Street Fighter III
description: Sin descripción

name: Claustrophobic Nights
description: Claustrophobic Nights is a recreation of Crawlspace 2 in the style of FNaF Help Wanted with multiplayer included. In the game, you crawl through tight spaces and solve various puzzles whilst evading animatronics in order to beat the night.

name: Zombie Farm
description: Tired of killing zombies? Try farming them!

name: Kerry and Alice Run into Some Trouble
description: Pals in space, doing space-jobs.

name: Magic Math
description:
A fun math game for one or two players for our beloved C64!

This game was heavily inspired by a Playstation game.

Your player grid has a value, indicated by the dots. Pick up numbers adding or subtracting to or from your value. Never go below 0 or above 9.
In case you are overwhelmed you can trigger one of three bombs by keeping the fire button pushed for a second.

Too easy for you? Go insane with a second player in coop or versus modes!

Can you enter the highscore table?

name: Super 8 Football
description: Super 8 Football is an American football game using real NFL teams and players. There are 8 playoff teams from last season made up of 16 players with 8 on both offense and defense. The game requires two players.

name: On Tuesday, Trevor Found His Shovel
description: A game about digging up the past.

name: Super Monza GP 2
description:
This is a racing game for the 32K expanded Commodore VIC 20.

This game expands on the the original game by adding three more circuits (Monaco, Spa and Interlagos).

Colliding with cars now results in damage, which can be repaired by entering the pits during the race. More damage equals slower maximum speed.

"Race against the clock" mode has been replaced by a "Championship" mode, where you have to complete every race with a podium finish in order to continue.

name: Hot Dog Reporter
description:
Hot Dog Reporter is a (very early access) game about a hot dog in a hurry.

It's a fast paced platformer with a speedrun mode that will eventually turn into a metroidvania with a mystery to solve and charmingly weird characters to meet (and a speedrun mode). Once the linear levels are iterated on enough to finalize Hot Dog Reporter's mechanics, gameplay will begin to spill onto the sprawling, interconnected city streets of New Yorkshire City.

name: Orbit Salvager
description:
Part of the DOS Games June 2023 Jam.

Play as long as you can and try to beat your own score.

Collect clothes dryers (to prevent them from eventually falling on cities below) without missing any, and don't crash into the cities yourself!

The ship has very little fuel on-board, and every action (thrust, shots) use some fuel. Make more fuel by shooting asteroids, with your asteroid-to-fuel converter beam.

name: The Bone Maze
description: A labyrinth filled with corpses, and a minotaur at its center.

name: Bloktris
description:
A Tetris clone for 8-bit computers and consoles.

Based on the original DOS version, play the classic block matching game now with the classic background images.

name: MSX-Dino
description: A Google Chrome Dinosaur game brought to the MSX as part of the BASIC 10-Liner Contest 2023

name: Atari's Freeway for MSX-BASIC 2
description: This game was projected to be fit in 10 lines and also show how to move all the 32 sprites of MSX in a fast way although the low speed of MSX-BASIC. The achieve this, the sprites trajectory need to be pre-renderized and the game takes about 3:20 minutes before to be ready to play. Please be patient!

name: CatsPots
description:
Cats Pots is a game inspired by the mechanics of the Crackpots from Atari 2600, where the objective is to prevent mice from drilling into a fence and invading the house, earning points with each victory.

Written in MSX BASIC and compiled with MSXBAS2ROM, this is a MSX 1 compatible game.

name: Turbo-Trex By Orazio Cacciola
description:
Mom Trex has to go and save her little one, kidnapped by his archenemy who wants revenge after the last lost battle. You will have to cross the desert plain, full of angry Pterodactyls, who do not hesitate to jump on you. After that, she will have to go through the big forest, where the Swift Raptors will be waiting for her, they also hate the Trex. She and finally she will have to go through the valley of volcanoes and she will have to be very careful of the fireballs raining down from the sky. At the end of this long journey, you will arrive in the home of the enemy, a large carnivore, where you will face the fight to the death.

Our Trex will have to avoid all the obstacles that she will find on the way throughout the journey. She will have the ability to defend herself against enemies by spitting a flame of fire from her mouth, which range will be short range, so she will have to throw it when the enemy is close. The more enemies she knocks down, the more energy she will accumulate to be able to last longer in the final battle.

name: Freefall by MSX Murcia
description: The objective of the game is to reach the maximum level and catch as many smiley faces

name: Double Symbol
description: It is a card game in which all of the cards are laid face down on a surface and two cards are flipped face up over each turn. The object of the game is to turn over pairs of matching cards. It is a particularly good game for young children, though adults may find it challenging and stimulating as well. The scheme is often used in quiz shows and can be employed as an educational game.

name: Fishing the Deep
description:
Fish the deepest depths of the ocean with this Nintendo DS Homebrew Game!

Created in 48 hours for the Ludum Dare 48 Compo Event.

name: Pac-01
description:
A certain round yellow guy, who’s probably the most iconic video game character ever, makes his entrance in ARC8’s recent MSX game called “PAC-01”. That’s right, it is Pac-Man himself that makes waves in the world’s fastest dot eating game.

Combine Pac-Man with relentless vertical scrolling, and you get an interesting game concept. In PAC-01, your playfield scrolls from bottom to top, as pills are scattered around to be eaten. However, pills aren’t the sole item on the menu. The point of PAC-01 is that you advance a level when you had all six of the the spooky baddies for lunch – or dinner, whatever you prefer. Also, as is only befitting in a Pac-Man themed game, pieces of fruit will appear occasionally to serve as a refreshing snack which will increase your score.

In this fine piece of Z80 entertainment, you hunt down the ghosts that escaped from the glitch; the deadly green computer bits at the bottom of the screen. This pool of game glitches also means instant death to our yellow little protagonist. So, don’t let those bits byte you!

PAC-01 features a one and two player mode, as well as a “Fast Game” mode. Whereas the objective in the 1P mode is to munch up all of the ghosts, in 2P mode the player with the most points wins when the game is over (which happens when the maze ends).

As for the Fast Mode it means… well, just survive!

name: Soviet Union 2010
description: You control a space ship that's equipped with a cannon. Your mission is to destroy as many USA-serving ships as possible, and get out alive while getting as many points as possible.

name: Tiny 2048
description: A 2048 clone for Arduboy

Make a 2048 tile!

The game is played on a 4 x 4 board and the player starts with two number 2 tiles.

Each turn where the player makes a valid move, another number 2 tile is added to the game board (a valid move is moving the tiles, or combining tiles). If you try to move in such a way that no move is completed, a turn is not registered and no new number "2" is added to the board.

You make new tiles by combining the tiles already on the board. Combine 2 and 2 to make a 4, combine 4 and 4 to make an 8 and so on, combine a 1024 and 1024 to make a 2048.

Game over occurs when the board is full and you no longer have a valid move available (ie no way to move or combine tiles).

It sounds way more complex that it is.

name: Canabalt
description: Sin descripción

name: Laughing to Die
description: Nannan returned to her hometown to attend her grandmother's funeral.

name: The Sins
description: Sin descripción

description: Street Fighter fan game.

description: Street fighter fangame.

description: Street fighter fangame with Chun-Li.
