name: Seal Online: Eternal Destiny
description: An anime-style MMO based on the original Seal Online game. The features six classes with two sub-classes available for each.

name: Oripathy
description: A series of short/medium-length speedmaps made throughout the course of one month and a half.

name: Seal M
description:
Seal Online comes to mobile as Seal M!

Immerse yourself in a vibrant and enchanting world filled with whimsical monsters and characters!

name: Blastar
description:
Blastar was a game written by Elon Musk in 1984 (at the age of 12). The source code was published in a magazine and he received $500 for it. Ashlee Vance's Elon Musk: Tesla, SpaceX and the Quest for a Fantastic Future includes a reproduction of the page from the publication where it appeared. This version is based on that listing.
Elon has since moved beyond 8-bit spaceships.

"[It was] a trivial game... but better than Flappy Bird."
--Elon Musk

name: She'sn
description: She'sn is a visual novel dating sim which focuses on a four different stories through all four seasons. The player can select to play the story of any season in any order. Different season also features different heroines and different love stories to play through.

name: Netto de Para
description: A port of Nekopara: Nekosogi Paradise that removes sexual content. Released in Japan for Dreamcast and in Korea for PC.

name: Where the Two Flowers Meet
description: An indie psychological horror visual novel about the meaning of everything that has been lost, along with the memories of our time together.

name: Enemy Star
description: Enemy Star is a Lander-style game, where the player is a bomb defusal pilot, blasting away through heavily defended underground caverns, past wind tunnels, fire walls and subterranean lakes. There are 27 missions across 5 different worlds.

name: Kogepan: Pan mo Game wo Yaru-rashii
description: A collection of puzzles with some mini games features the characters of the Kogepan series.

name: Gensokishi Online
description: Gensokishi Online is a fully immersive and massively multiplayer online role-playing game. It is a reimagining of the classic game Elemental Knights Online, which won the prestigious Best Game Award in Taiwan back in 2008. Gensokishi Online continues the legacy of its predecessor while incorporating modern blockchain tools and a vast Metaverse.

name: Fantastic Haven
description: Restore the equilibrium of magic by saving endangered fantasy creatures. Build your shelter to welcome and protect them, explore unique regions, rally neighboring populations to your cause and rehabilitate creatures in their natural environment.

name: Sudoku Race
description: Sudoku Race is a browser based online multiplayer game of Sudoku. The aim of the game is to complete your board before the other players.

name: Absurd Trolley Problems
description: A game that gives you increasingly absurd trolley problems. Help humanity solve philosophy by solving all the trolley problems.

name: Biggles On Mars
description: Grandson of the famous pilot, Biggles makes his living defending the planet of Mars with his rickety plane. Can he overcome a menacing scheme and also finally move into a new line of work?

name: Beloved Nightmare
description: A mobile otome game.

name: Vampire Boyfriend
description: Sin descripción

name: Library Cross: Toki ga Kitara, Kono Negai wo
description: Produced by otome game label Otomate, LibraryCross is a crazily huge crossover between many of the developer's works, including Amnesia, Hakuoki, Norn9, Beast and Princess, Welcome to Fukujuro, and Yunohana SpRINGI. Featuring nine original characters, the heroine is a medical student who finds herself locked up in a mysterious place upon waking up. Having only a strange white book and a clock, she will have to choose between following the instructions in the book to escape, or to die in that room once the clock hits 13:00.

name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Shredder's Revenge - Anniversary Edition
description:
This edition includes:
- Sprite Sticker Sheet
- Art Booklet
- Pizza Hut Personal Pan Pizza Coupon
- Dimension Shellshock DLC

name: Police Pursuit
description: Patrol the town and pursue the criminals before the time's up.

name: Wo Long: Fallen Dynasty - Conqueror of Jiangdong
description:
The second DLC, "Conqueror of Jiangdong," follows Sun Ce as he and his forces set out to conquer the territories of Jiangdong after the death of his father, Sun Jian.
This engaging story features new battlefields, weapons, equipment, and demons, in addition to a new Divine Beast, a more challenging difficulty level and an endgame content.

name: Exoprimal: Season 1
description: Sin descripción

name: Exoprimal: Season 2
description: Season 2 includes a new Survival Pass and runs from October 18th, 2023 to January 17th, 2024.

description: Rabbitmaiden Softbook is a companion visual novel to the mainline rabbitmaiden softworks vns (e.g. heartlovepowertemple)

name: 100animalese
description: An action-adventure game where you work together with a total of 100 animals to escape from a mysterious facility.

description: Sin descripción

description: Very difficult horizontally-scrolling shooting game.

description: Sin descripción

description: Sin descripción

description: Sin descripción

name: Skull Scavenger
description:
Skull Scavenger is an unforgiving twin-stick Extraction Looter Shooter where you are a soul trying to get out of hell.

Procedurally generated maps ensure you never escape from the same level twice!

name: Super Mario World: VIP and Wall Mix
description: Sin descripción

name: Super Mario World: VIP and Wall Mix 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Tom Clancy's The Division 3
description:
Julian Gerighty is returning to the Division brand he helped usher into the world. Gerighty has been appointed Executive Producer for The Division Brand, and will make the move once Star Wars Outlaws – a game he is currently overseeing as Creative Director - has shipped.

Gerighty is excited to return The Division. Before he joined Tom Clancy’s The Division team as Associate Creative Director in 2014, he remembers seeing the promise in its first reveal at E3 2013. “I remember the gameplay promise – the co-op, PvP, the open world RPG aspects. Its world seemed very relatable, and very realistic, like you could really be an agent for change within it.”

After joining the team at Massive Entertainment – A Ubisoft Studio and shipping the original in 2016, he moved to Tom Clancy’s The Division 2 as Creative Director, where he and his team crafted a new adventure in the summertime streets of Washington, D.C. Now, he’s setting his sights on Tom Clancy’s The Division 3, as well as the plethora of other projects set in The Division universe, including the mobile game Tom Clancy’s The Division Resurgence, and the survival-action shooter Tom Clancy’s The Division Heartland.

name: Assassin's Creed II: Game of the Year Edition
description: An edition of Assassin's Creed II that includes both DLC, made available for Xbox 360. Effectively the Xbox 360 equivalent of the PS3's ultimate edition.

name: Sure Shot featuring Sonic the Hedgehog: Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Super Slope Muncher
description: Sin descripción

name: Super Nova
description: Sin descripción

name: Yohane the Parhelion: Numazu in the Mirage
description: Yohane the Parhelion: Numazu in the Mirage is a deck-building roguelite set in the world of Yohane the Parhelion.

name: Pretty Pet Salon
description: Run a pet-grooming salon! Pets must be groomed correctly to maintain customer satisfaction and the salon's profit.

name: Retro Bowl College
description:
The official spin-off of the smash hit Retro Bowl takes you back to the old-school. If you thought managing a pro team was a challenge - you've seen nothing yet!

Make a name for yourself as a winning head coach for one of 250 college teams. Manage tight budgets and encourage your hotheaded young players to keep their eye on the ball when they're surrounded by the temptations and distractions of college life. Can you tell the difference between the next pro football superstar and the party animal who doesn't know when to quit? Can you foster their talents and help them make the draft? Can you turn your school into the greatest football college of all time?

name: The Legend of Heroes: Trails of Cold Steel III / The Legend of Heroes: Trails of Cold Steel IV
description: A bundle including Trails of Cold Steel III and Trails of Cold Steel IV for the PS5, with enhanced performance and bonus cosmetic DLC.

name: The Legend of Heroes: Trails through Daybreak - Limited Edition
description: The Limited Edition includes The Legend of Heroes: Trails through Daybreak - Deluxe Edition, Digital Soundtrack, Mini Art Book, "TRAILS UNCOVERED" 240+ Page Art Book, Disc Digipak Soundtrack, Steelbook, ARKRIDE Solutions Office Business Card Case, Calvardian Cinema" Movie Poster Art Card Set and Collector's Box with "Oct-Genesis" Outer Sleeve.

name: Airwolf
description:
Airwolf, based on the Donald Bellisario 80s TV show about a hi-tech military helicopter solving Cold War era missions, is a horizontal shoot-em-up. Kyugo Boueki originally created it for the Arcades in 1987 and it would receive an NES home version the following year. It is not to be confused with the 1989 Airwolf licensed game from Beam Entertainment and Acclaim.

The player receives their mission via an introductory cutscene, chooses the weapon load-out for the Airwolf that best suits the kind of resistance they're likely to face (so an emphasis on bombs if there's expected to be a lot of ground units) and is sent off to complete the mission.

For the boss battles, the game will occasionally switch to a first-person view in which the controller guides a set of crosshairs on screen. The goal of these battles is to shoot down each element of the boss (guns, etc.) as well as any projectiles the boss sends the player's way.

name: The Legend of Heroes: Trails through Daybreak - Deluxe Edition
description: The Deluxe Edition includes the Base Game, Digital Soundtrack and Mini Art Book.

name: The Legend of Heroes: Trails of Cold Steel III / The Legend of Heroes: Trails of Cold Steel IV - Limited Edition
description:
Limited Edition for this bundle including two entries from the Cold Steel series. The Limited Edition includes:
• The Legend of Heroes: Trails of Cold Steel III / The Legend of Heroes: Trails of Cold Steel IV - Deluxe Edition
• Hardcover art book
• Atlas of Erebonia cloth map
• "Erebonian Landmarks" postcard set
• Divine Knights & Awakeners art card set
• Collector's Box

name: Pocket Frogs Splash
description: The Pocket Frogs are out of their habitats and making a splash! Play four fun mini games and collect all the Pocket Frogs by earning achievements!

name: The Legend of Heroes: Trails of Cold Steel III / The Legend of Heroes: Trails of Cold Steel IV - Deluxe Edition
description:
Deluxe Edition for this bundle including two entries from the Cold Steel series. The Deluxe Edition includes:
• The Legend of Heroes: Trails of Cold Steel III
• The Legend of Heroes: Trails of Cold Steel IV
• Mini art book
• Digital soundtrack

name: The Best Play Baseball '90
description: Best Play Pro Yakyuu '90 is a Sports game, developed and published by ASCII Entertainment, which was released in Japan in 1990.

name: The Best Play Baseball II
description: Best Play Pro Yakyuu II is a Sports game, developed and published by ASCII Entertainment, which was released in Japan in 1990.

name: CrossFire
description: Despite sharing a name with the American release of Super Airwolf and sharing a publisher, CrossFire is a very different game; whereas the Genesis game is a top-down Commando-style run-and-gun, the Famicom game is a single-plane side-scroller, more akin to Contra with brawler implements.

name: Half-Life 2: MMod - Half-Life 2: Update
description: This mod is to run Half-Life 2: Update (itself a mod for the original Half-Life 2) under MMod.

name: Plumbers Don't Wear Ties: Definitive Edition - Collector's Edition
description: Plumbers Don't Wear Ties: Definitive Edition - Collector's Edition includes a physical copy of the game (on USB or Disc, PC release contains a bonus Steam key), a strategy guide, an 18"x24" reversible poster, a wearable replica tie, an "Plumber on a Bike" decal, a sticker sheet, 4x6 framed picture of the protagonist Jane and an 7" vinyl that contains the soundtrack of the game.

name: Syndicate of Souls
description: A tactical MOBA with a classic old-school feel and a few innovative twists. In "Syndicate of Souls", battle unfolds across three distinct maps. "Roadway To Ruin" is a 1v1 snowy bridge, providing tense duels. "Deserted Stronghold", a 3v3 map, places players amid swampy ruins, emphasizing team tactics. Lastly, "Dreamfall Grove", a 5v5 battleground, immerses players in a mystical forest with vibrant fauna, promoting expansive team strategies. Each map reflects the game`s emphasis on tactical gameplay, strategic positioning, and environmental interaction.

name: The Assassins: PD Games Volume 01
description: Amiga compilation disc with 5 games by the famous Assassins.

name: Metal Freezer
description: An arcade maze game by Seibu Kaihatsu where you move a ship around a maze to highlight all the tiles, eliminating enemies by shooting them with your Freezing Beam and then pushing them while they're frozen.

name: Mimizu Panzer
description: Snake like tank game.
